participant_1.background:
My cosplay costume is coming in the mail, so I'm going to start practicing my makeup this weekend.
I read my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things.
My family works to support my dreams.
people do not like me too much but i like them anyways.
i am a karate black belt.

participant_2.background:
I maintained a healthy weight last year.
i am very popular and have a lot of friends.
I rent an apartment near my favorite sushi bar.
I am indifferent to the weather.
I listened to my favorite songs on my tablet while getting ready for my last birthday.

content.text: Hi there! How are you?
Hey! I'm doing pretty well, how are you?
I'm doing great! I'm excited for my new cosplay costume to come in the mail so I can start practicing my makeup this weekend.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love cosplay. What character are you going to be?
I'm going to be Sailor Saturn! She's one of my favorite characters from Sailor Moon.
Sailor Saturn is awesome! I love her design. Do you have a lot of other cosplay costumes?
I have a few others, but this is my first Sailor Moon cosplay. I'm really excited to put it together.
I'm sure it'll look great! I'm looking forward to seeing pictures.
Thanks! I'll be sure to post some when I'm done.
Awesome! I'll be sure to check them out.
Cool! So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, listen to music, and hang out with my friends.
Those are all great things to do! I love reading too, especially comic books.
Me too! I have a huge collection of comic books.
That's awesome! I have a few comic book collections myself, but I'm always looking to add to them.
Me too! I love finding new comic books to read.
Do you have a favorite comic book series?
I have a few favorite comic book series, but my favorite is probably Batman.
Batman is a great series! I love the character design and the story lines.
Me too! I'm excited for the new Batman movie that's coming out.
Me too! I'm hoping it's good.
I'm sure it will be!
